column3: This is not the case, as RPCConsole::FormatBytes uses 1024-based units for the network traffic stats. (IMO it should continue to do so.)\n
As well as prune, which is already out. So changing may not be a no brainer.\n

AFAIK, network traffic stats almost universally use 1000-based units elsewhere.
I think it's good to be conssitent.
But I don't care deep enough to keep this open.
